name: wingfit
tagline: A fitness and workout tracking application
description: Wingfit is a self-hosted fitness and workout tracking app. It lets users define routines, record sessions, and view progress over time in a clean web interface optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.

features.title: Workout Logging
features.description: Record exercise sessions with exercises, sets, reps, and weights for comprehensive tracking

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor strength gains and performance improvements with charts and statistics

features.title: Exercise Library
features.description: Access a database of common exercises with instructions and muscle group information

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your workout data from any device with a responsive web interface
